channel.title: » ZenScape « - The Server Of The Century
channel.description:
We came up with this idea when I and Bakatool had a conversation. We were going to make RS2! We coded something up and this is what we already got: (Started from WinterLove's) - ALL full skills - ALL Npcs - Fixed client.java - Basics of special attacks.
[size=10pt]Currently Working on:[/size] • Special attacks
[size=15pt]Have to do:[/size] • Minigames • Quests • 4x exp rate • Tutorial Island • Hook up server to a website • Buy a host (€75 / €200)
[size=15pt]Server info:[/size] Trying to REmake RS2 with a 4x exp rate. Having free worlds and member worlds With 377 cache. Having multiple hosts for member and free worlds.
[size=15pt]Host info:[/size] Model Dell PE860 CPU Dualcore Pentium 2,8 RAM 2 GB DDR2 ECC Harddisk 2x 250 GB Raid Yes Verbinding 1000 mbit Datatransfer 2500 GB IP adressen 3 IP's Besturingsysteem Windows/Linux Setup € 50,00 Monthly € 150,00
- Will post pictures later -

item.title: » ZenScape « - The Server Of The Century
item.dc:creator: @Jay_Laze .Jay Laze
item.description:
@Jay_Laze wrote:

I would help but i forgot about cache seeking. Some guy named pop(somethen) made it where you could go to runescape.com (on there client) & watch the cache load up. Then you’d have to fix the errors thats in it.

Read full topic

We came up with this idea when I and Bakatool had a conversation. We were going to make RS2!
We coded something up and this is what we already got: (Started from WinterLove’s)

  • ALL full skills
  • ALL Npcs
